column5: Third floor condo with great balcony view of Comal River and Landa Park Golf Course.   As of August 29, 2016, we have installed our own private internet; no more slow internet from having to share with the rest of the condos!.  Jump right in the river from our property and enjoy one of the longest floats on the river - tubes and an air pump are provided.  Everything downtown including restaurants, nightlife, Schlitterbahn, and Wurstfest are walking distance.   Pool and hot tub on property.
column8: On the Comal, Central to Everything
